metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16144 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: When using an object storage like S3 as the file store, when a user createsa public link to a folder where anonymous users can upload files, andanother user uploads a virus the files antivirus app would detect the virusbut fails to delete it due to permission issues. This affects thefiles_antivirus component versions before 0.15.2 for ownCloud.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
